field.label: Enable SNMPTRAPD Service
field.help: This will activate the snmpdtrapd service.

field.label: SNMP Community
field.help: Set the community string to use.

field.label: Listen IPs
field.help: Set the IP addresses the service should listen to.

field.label: Forward traps to mail?
field.help: This will forward all traps to the mail contact specified below

field.label: Mail contact
field.help: Set the contact address to use.
